title: Confluent | Security Engineer
content:
Education: B.Tech in Tier 4 College
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: 3 Internships at startups

Location: Remote
Salary: INR 23 Lakhs
Annual Bonus: Target bonus INR 1.15 Lakhs
Stock bonus: RSUs worth USD 40,000 (Vesting Plan 3 years at 33% each year)

Benefits: Standard Benefits( Internet + Cell Phone 60 usd per month, Free medical Inssurance for family, etc)
Other details: Off-campus

title: Nutanix | MTS 1 | BENGALURU
content:
Education: Tier 3 college
    Years of Experience: 1 year
    Prior Experience: I won't mention the company's name, but the job was for an embedded developer role. I also have experience of open source contribution.
    Date of the Offer: Sep 2023
    Company: Nutanix
    Title/Level: MTS - 1
    Location: Bengaluru
    Salary: 2000000
    Relocation/Signing Bonus: NA (sad)
    Stock bonus: 18k USD 
    Bonus: NA
    Total comp (Salary  + Stock):  35 LPA INR
    Benefits: Standard like cab, food, insurance etc
    Other details: I think I got a lower offer because I didn't have other options, and I was tired of interviews. My current salary is low, so this new offer is a big improvement and will help me in future negotiations.
